div.p: Data cannot be shared publicly because the ownership of the data belongs to the Assembly of First Nations as approved by the Research Ethics Board of the University of Ottawa. Data are available from the Assembly of First Nations (Contact: General Counsel, email: swuttke@afn.ca) or the Office of Research Ethics and Integrity of the University of Ottawa (Contact: Research Ethics Coordinator, email: ethics@uottawa.ca) for researchers who meet the criteria for access to confidential data.
